events.message: I purchased a jacket two weeks ago but it does not fit, and I would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request related to product return and money back procedures.
Support agent John Smith has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to process a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, I only tried it on once and found it too tight, no damage or wear at all.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund upon receipt of the jacket. I'll send you a prepaid shipping label so you can return it at no cost.
That sounds perfect, thank you very much. I will send it back as soon as I receive the label.
The prepaid shipping label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have returned the jacket and to update you on the refund status.
I sent the jacket back yesterday via the prepaid label. Please let me know if you receive it and when the refund will be issued.
We have received your returned jacket and the refund has been processed to your original payment method.
We sent you a short survey to get feedback on your refund experience. Your input helps us improve our service.
I completed the survey and I’m very satisfied with how the refund process was handled. Thank you for your prompt support.
The case has been formally closed following the successful refund and positive feedback from the customer.
